Testimonial.title: Making life easier for people at:
Testimonial.Magnus: AskPDFs.io has completely transformed how I interact with documents. The AI-powered search and summarization make finding information effortless. It's a game-changer for research and productivity!
Testimonial.Anna: I love how intuitive and fast AskPDFs.io is! It saves me hours by instantly answering questions from long PDFs. Whether for work or study, this tool is a must-have!
Testimonial.Harun: No more endless scrolling through PDFs! AskPDFs.io gives me precise answers in seconds. It's reliable, efficient, and incredibly easy to use. Highly recommended!

HomePage.title: Chat With Your PDFs in
HomePage.underTitle: Transform your static documents into interactive conversations with AI-powered
HomePage.serviceTitle1: Manage and chat with your PDFs
HomePage.review1Title: What’s New — Smarter Questions, Better Answers
HomePage.review1Text: We’re always improving to help you get the most out of your PDFs. From tools that enhance your questions for clearer, sharper answers to smoother navigation and helpful modules, everything is built to make your experience easier and faster.
HomePage.review2Title: Instant PDF Upload — Start the Conversation in Seconds
HomePage.review2Text: Drag and drop your PDFs or select files from your device—no complicated setup required. Our streamlined uploader auto-processes your document so you can begin asking questions right away
HomePage.review3Text: Enjoy a chat experience that understands context across pages and chapters. Whether you refer back to an earlier section or dive into a new topic, the system maintains continuity so you get coherent, relevant answers every time.

questions.text: Summarize this document in a few sentences.
What are the key points or main arguments in this document?
Who is the author of this document
Can you provide a bullet-point summary of this document?

faq.bodyText: If you can’t find the answer, feel free to send an email to
faq.askPDFDescription: AskPDF is an innovative AI-powered platform that transforms the way you work with PDF documents. Simply upload your PDF and start asking questions – our advanced AI will analyze the content and provide instant, precise answers.
faq.subscriptionDifference: What is the difference between the subscriptions?
faq.subscriptionDifferenceDescription: Starter is free and gives access to 1 PDF without advanced features. Premium allows multiple uploads, GPT-4, and support. Ultimate offers unlimited access, large files, early features, and the best AI experience. Our recommendation: choose Starter if you just want to try the platform for free. Choose Premium if you use the PDF assistant regularly and want stronger AI. Choose Ultimate if you need unlimited usage, large files, and access to all features.
faq.uploadLimit: Why can’t I upload more PDFs?
faq.uploadLimitDescription: This may mean you’ve reached your upload limit.
faq.trialPeriod: Can I get a trial period?
faq.trialPeriodDescription: Yes, for the Premium subscription we offer a 7-day trial period.
faq.fileFormatDescription: AskPDF currently supports PDF files. We ensure compatibility with most PDF versions and structures, including searchable PDFs.
faq.dataPrivacyDescription: We take data protection seriously. Your uploaded PDFs are handled securely. All data is encrypted during transfer, and we do not share your information with third parties.
faq.accuracy: How accurate are the AI answers?
faq.accuracyDescription: Our AI model provides highly accurate answers based on the content of your PDF. However, as with any AI system, we recommend verifying critical information against the original document. Accuracy depends on factors such as document quality and the clarity of the questions asked.
